0:
--------------------
Text: Passu Sar (Urdu: ‎ ; or Passu Sar, Passu I) is a mountain peak in the Batura Muztagh, a sub-range of the Karakoram mountain range, located in the Gilgit District of Gilgit-Baltistan, Pakistan, west of the Hunza Valley.

Triplets:
<Passu Sar
2:
--------------------
Text: Passu Sar:  The peak lies on the main ridge of the Batura Muztagh, about 7 km (4 mi) east of Batura Sar.
Triplets:<Passu Sar
